title: Alert generator progress output pollutes JSON mode
description: BUG: When using output_format='json' for plan/apply commands, the alert generator in generators/alerts.py prints progress messages to stdout (📊 Loading alerts..., ✓ postgresql: 15 alerts, etc.) which mixes with JSON output, making it unparseable. The JSON starts after progress messages instead of at character 0. Discovered during test coverage work. Files: src/nthlayer/generators/alerts.py (lines 184-220 print statements). Fix: Add quiet parameter to generate_alerts_for_service() or redirect progress to stderr when caller specifies JSON output.
